text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the MSI GE65 9SE-009CA Raider 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GE65 9SE-009CA Raider 15.6" 240 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
